# title

**Instance Property**

The title for the window tab.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The title displays within the window tab when the associated window is part of a tabbing group.

By default, the title of the window tab follows the title of its associated window, but it may be customized using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/title] property. If the title has been customized, setting the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindowTab/title] property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0] causes it to follow the window’s title again.

## Customizing the Title

- **attributedTitle**: The title for the window tab, specified as an attributed string.

items.description: The title for the window tab, specified as an attributed string.
